description.value:
1. Bounty Hunter (250xp): +3 Willpower, +3 Fellowship, and Bloodtracker Talent. Gain either 1d5 Corruption or 1d5 Insanity.
2. Xenos Hunter (250xp): +3 Weapon Skill or +3 Ballistic Skill. Gain either Leap Up or Sprint Talent. Gain either Scholastic Lore (Beasts) or Tracking as Trained Skills.
3. Hunted (100xp): +3 Perception. Gain either Paranoia or Light Sleeper Talents. Gain Enemy Talent for whichever group is hunting you (Subject to GM Approval)

requirements.text: Origin Path: Lure of the Void

choices.label: Choose from: Leap Up, Sprint Talent
Choose from: Scholastic Lore (Beasts), Tracking as Trained Skills
Choose from: Paranoia, Light Sleeper Talents

3. Hunted (100xp): +3 Perception. Gain either Paranoia or Light Sleeper Talents. Gain Enemy Talent for whichever group is hunting you (Subject to GM Approval)
